aegis-prime-station.title: Aegis Prime Station
aegis-prime-station.content: The largest research station in the Ophiuchus Sector. It serves as a vital refueling hub for long-range explorers.
aegis-prime-station.lore: The largest research station in the Ophiuchus Sector. It serves as a vital refueling hub for long-range explorers.

unit-x99.title: Unit X-99
unit-x99.content:
A high-performance security android with a glitch in its behavioral subroutines. It shows a curious interest in human poetry.

It was the sole survivor of [[The Void Breach]].
unit-x99.lore:
A high-performance security android with a glitch in its behavioral subroutines. It shows a curious interest in human poetry.

It was the sole survivor of [[The Void Breach]].

dr-aris-vance.title: Dr. Aris Vance
dr-aris-vance.content: A brilliant astrophysicist who was the first to detect the anomaly. He spent most of his life studying the Void.
dr-aris-vance.lore: A brilliant astrophysicist who was the first to detect the anomaly. He spent most of his life studying the Void.

mining-corp.title: Interstellar Mining Corp
mining-corp.content: A massive conglomerate that owns the mining rights to the sector. They value efficiency over human life.
mining-corp.lore: A massive conglomerate that owns the mining rights to the sector. They value efficiency over human life.

void-stalker.title: Void Stalker
void-stalker.content: A multi-limbed nightmare that feeds on thermal energy. It is nearly invisible in the vacuum of space.
void-stalker.lore: A multi-limbed nightmare that feeds on thermal energy. It is nearly invisible in the vacuum of space.

belt-signal-log.title: Signal from the Orion Belt
belt-signal-log.content: A high-frequency digital signal received from deep space. Its patterns seem to be a primitive countdown.
belt-signal-log.lore: A high-frequency digital signal received from deep space. Its patterns seem to be a primitive countdown.

the-void-breach.title: The Void Breach
the-void-breach.content: A spontaneous rupture in the space-time continuum that nearly swallowed the station. Its origin remains unknown.
the-void-breach.lore: A spontaneous rupture in the space-time continuum that nearly swallowed the station. Its origin remains unknown.
